titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Collection of photographic illustrations of locations in Brooklyn V1991.070
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Patricia Glowinski
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-28T16:19-0500

did.unittitle: Collection of photographic illustrations of locations in Brooklyn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Collection of photographic illustrations (photochroms) of locations in Brooklyn consists of 23 color photographic illustrations showing views of Brooklyn including houses, churches, schools, and streets, circa 1900 to 1920. Each illustration measures 4 x 6.5 inches and includes a brief description printed on the bottom recto. It is likely that the illustrations were detached from the book, Brooklyn's Garden: Views of Picturesque Flatbush, by Charles A. Ditmas.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Reproduction rights for the photographs have not been evaluated. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition for this collection are unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1991.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Collection of photographic illustrations of locations in Brooklyn, V1991.070, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Fully processed to the item level.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: The Brooklyn Historical Society holds an additional collection related to the illustrations that comprise this collection, Brooklyn's Garden: Views of Picturesque Flatbush viewbook (V1986.019). Please consult with library staff for more information.
